title: The Peasants is recruiting a BRONZE Roster FOR PROFESSIONAL TREATMENT!
body:
That's right, you heard it correctly.

Hello! I am the manager and coach of a semi-professional team The Knights, a team that has claimed victory in multiple tournaments, earning hundreds of dollars and skin prizes in the process. Formerly coaching a professional, now dissolved organisation, I am now using my abilities to choose FIVE BRONZE MEMBERS (NOT SILVER OR HIGHER) and provide them with the professional pampering that proper organisations get (This is an opportunity, pretty much). We understand that Bronze is a difficult place to get out, but in reality, anyone who truly didn't deserve to be in that position would get out, and I am here to offer you the ability to get out.

What can The Peasants do FOR YOU?

- Provide a TeamSpeak 3 Server for Sessions.
- Pay for ALL tournament fee entries.
- Provide ALL players with team coaching staff, including a professional coach and analyst to ensure continual improvement.
- Provide a friendly and fun environment to improve, while maintaining a competitive atmosphere in gaming.
- Give all the rostered members the professional pamperment (Being part of an established organisation) that only Platinums/Diamonds+ get to see!

What do I expect from you?

- Let's face it, you guys are quite darn bad. Players must get into the game knowing this, and look for the opportunity to continue improving their play. If you are stubborn and believe you are stuck because you went "2/3/1" while your team fed, you will obviously not be selected. I am looking for the distinct, non-toxic BRONZE players.
- This is an amazing opportunity, and only players who express their excitement and have a deep passion for the scene will be selected for a position.
- Must come to all selected training sessions.

All Roles Are Currently Open, these being:

Top: 
Jungle:
Mid:
ADC:
Support:

So, write down in the comments this short application (All random friend requests will be declined, you MUST put a blurb here)

Name: 
Age:
Availability:
Role (The one you are applying for):
Do you have a TeamSpeak?:
Why you are in Bronze:
What opportunity do you see in this:

I look forward to meeting you all, and turning you guys from Bronzes to a much, much higher rank!

replies.body:
Name : Shyt
Age : 22
Availability : ~5 PM - 10 PM everyday (depend on school work but i allocate that time just for gaming)
Role : Support or Jungle (I'm more comfortable playing tank)
Do you have TeamSpeak? : Yes, but i have no idea how to use it
Why are you in Bronze : 
Several reason listed below (I just did my 10 placement game and i realize this)
- Lack of map awareness
- Always forget to buy pink ward
- My warding skill can be considered bad
- I can't play carry role champions
- I can't shot call
- Sometimes hungry for kills or securing one
- I'm very bad at last hitting
What opportunity do you see in this : At least I wish to learn the game better, able to coordinate any team with any player and last overcome my weakness listed above. I also wanted to try in tournament a few times but can't get a team, so maybe i can participate this time.

>- I'm very bad at last hitting
>Role : Support or Jungle

That moment when your jungler can't last hit jungle creeps.
xD goes for last hit. Jungle critter just vanishes, no xp earned
Jungle Creep is exception :P

Name: jared rogers
Age: 28
Availability: finish work at 3:30 so any time after then plus weekends im on all the time 
Role (The one you are applying for): support jungler and top
Do you have a TeamSpeak?: yes
Why you are in Bronze: maybe it the lack of team fights people these days just want to there own thing but could be me 
What opportunity do you see in this: to progress in this game maybe even to the point where i can be on the world stage who knows, but mostly to learn what my weakness are how and when to lead a fight reading plays before they happen.

Name: Russell/user Coffee4ever
Age:23
Availability:5 PM - 10 PM weekdays, 10 AM -10 PM weekends
Role (The one you are applying for):Jungle
Do you have a TeamSpeak?:yes
Why you are in Bronze:Role swap from support, mechanics, champion pool, decision making and objective control.
What opportunity do you see in this: I see this as  an opportunity to learn my new role faster then I could achieve on my own, I also think it would greatly improve my team work and get a feel for the competitive environment. I think it'd also be a fantastic opportunity to meet some great friends.

Name:The Gingninj69
Age:17
Availability:4.30PM onwards on school days and free on weekends
Role : Mid or ADC
Do you have a TeamSpeak?: Yes 
Why you are in Bronze: 
- I somtimes dont roam when im mid
- I usually solo queue which means i cant really shot call for my team cause i havent got a quick way to communicate it to them
- I struggle playing adc with a sup i havent played with before which can cause some tension if one of us dosent play the same way
- I have admitted im bad at the game otherwise i wouldnt be stuck in bronze
- When im adc i somtimes struggle with cs but i usually make up for it late game.
What opportunity do you see in this: I wish to leave bronze and gain knowledge from this, i see this as a chance to actually know a team and how each other play, i have wanted to play in some tournaments but never got a team to take me so maybe this is my chance, this is a chance for me to be a leader and shot call and potentially lead a team to victory.

Name: Combilizer
Age: 34
Availability: 24/7 except for after school Thursdays (back at about 6pm).
Role (The one you are applying for): Mid
Do you have a TeamSpeak?: Yes
Why you are in Bronze: I think its for a variety of reasons, I underestimate damage sometimes, play too conservatively, have bad mechanics with regards to ability cooldowns (e.g. my E on Kayle goes down a lot and then I'm killed), i usually play support because I'm not a confident laner to carry teams. Would be great to improve enough to carry a team!
What opportunity do you see in this: Improve a lot, and meet some new players in the scene, have a cool team of players on the same page and maybe improve to a level to play games with the pros in OCE (would love to face off against Swiffer one day ^_^). Disregard my age, I'm a gamer at heart, forever young!
Thanks for the opportunity. I've applied for some other teams on this site, but nobodies taken me onboard yet.
Don't know if this is a joke or real.
Real. I'm genuinely giving Bronzes an opportunity to improve, because I feel that everybody needs to be given the opportunity to improve despite their Solo Queue rank.
And yet i'm pretty sure everyone is trolling on this, feelsbadman
Jokes end up on them, they'll still be sitting their asses in B5 because "they can't carry their noob teams".

Yeah it does suck that most of the posts here have some form of "My teams are bad" rather then focusing on themselves, but that is basically bronze, you'd probably be better dealing with low silvers honestly.

TBH Yeah, I've found that the bronzes who have signed up go along with the lines of "my teams lack communication to me, or I don't need your help", etc. Bitch, you're in Bronze because YOU'RE SHIT. Your macro play is shit, your team play is shit, etc.
"NOOOOO my bronze ego, it's overpowering"
Hey my team play is amazing....except it's the wrong team :p
I dunno, I'm bronze 5 and finished at s4 last season. I got mates who finished at g3 and are currently s4. I think the oce community is getting better players out now.
Any chance I could get in on this even though I'm silver and if not maybe some advice on how to improve
Wow, hats off to you.
I see this thread has been recently necro'd. Seven months later, how'd it turn out? Did anything actually happen?

- Name: Kurt Russell (Revelations1911)
- Age: 19
- Availability: 5pm-11pm weekdays, Anytime most weekends
- Role: Support
- Do you have a TeamSpeak?: Yes

- Why you are in Bronze: I feel like i am in bronze because i lack the ability to synergize well (as a support) with a team that i do not know, whose strengths and weaknesses are not apparent to me. I play support based around my team and my teams ability, which makes it hard for me to be able to contribute if my team is considerably lacking. I have played support for over 2 years now, I play Leona main, Thresh, Braum, Naut, Morg. Any support that the team needs. I feel like i have the potential to do well in the higher elo but can not reach there myself due to my current knowledge and champion ability. I have climbed from B5 to B1-2 this season from promos, and looking to go higher.

- What opportunity do you see in this: I see this as an opportunity to learn, to improve, to make friends, have fun and most importantly is to enjoy our time together as a team and look forward to playing again together next time.
Will this all be done online? Or will it require offline participation.

Name: Mitch

Age: 18

Availability: everyday always

Role (The one you are applying for): jungle

Do you have a TeamSpeak?: yes

Why you are in Bronze: because of bad placements in teams, could strive so much higher with a boost or a good team

What opportunity do you see in this: to learn the game better and improve my skills and ranks

Name: Jujsjtjijn (Justin)
Age:16
Availability: 4pm-11pm weekly, all day weekends
Role (The one you are applying for): Mid
Do you have a TeamSpeak?: yes 
Why you are in Bronze: The main reason I am in bronze is that i haven't yet achieved the level of balance in my games.
For example: 
When i'm playing mid lane, i often don't roam enough or roam too much. I can't find the balance and would love to develop and work on this skill so that i can help benefit myself and my team in the future. If i roam too much, i lose lane and if i don't roam enough, i fell bad for no helping my team mates if they are struggling in lane.
I would also like to learn how to "recover" lane. This is when I fall behind from a gank, out play etc. and am not sure how to combat this. 
One of my key focuses in future games is to ward as often as possible. This may not include warding for our team and providing vision, but for also (when roaming) destroying any ward placed by the enemy team. 
I also need help during team fights, i mainly play a very aggressive mid, like LB, Zed or Ekko etc and in team fights, the only one with a little bit of utility is Ekko but apart from Zeds slow and LB's root, i am not really sure how to help my team in as many was as possible if we need CC for a tank and our support is dead etc.
To be honest, i'm not the worst CS in the world if the lane if  pretty fair match up, i wont loss much in CS, a little bit here and there but i still want to work on it.
I also need help when i fall behind. If i'm a very snowball heavy champ and i don't start to snowball, then i'm kind of stuck. I would like develop the skill and knowledge of when and when not too split push.
I Would like develop the skills to use my actives as soon as a team fights starts, but in reality by the time the fight begins, i don't use it because i worried if i use and there is no fight, i get flamed for wasting the active.
Last but not least, I know i am bad, that is why i am in bronze 3.
What opportunity do you see in this: I don't want to get Challenger (although if i was good enough then yes) But i just want to develop my skills and learn more and let my skill and knowledge place me in whatever rank i deserve. If at the end of this i get to bronze 2, then i would be happy, That is still an increase in rank and an increase in sill and would be very grateful of opportunity to be coached by someone who is a provisional coach and has the ability to teach other people. 
Thank you for taking my application in association.

Wow this seems like a once in a lifetime opportunity and im going to try for it!

Name: xSynx

Age: 24

Availability: Anytime, currently not working.

Role (The one you are applying for): Id love to learn to be a Jungle or Mid main

Do you have a TeamSpeak?: Yes I sure do!

Why you are in Bronze: I believe the worst part of my game is letting me down, which is positioning myself in different phases of the game, and also my knowledge on building the right items at the right time. I also have a bad habit of being tilted by toxic players. I watch a lot of youtube videos by Foxdrop which have helped a lot recently in that regard, but the toxicity still gets to me sometimes.

What opportunity do you see in this: I see this as a once in a lifetime opportunity to reach a goal ive set upon myself which is to become a better LoL player and reach diamond! If I were to be one of the people chosen, I would put my heart and soul into it, as well as my time and effort!

Hope to hear from you soon!

xSynx
